text: 14.4 Mat 7.1, Jem 4.11-12 Nɨbi bɨ olap binɨb wog gɨñeb ne okok, kɨli tap tɨmel gebal agɨl ma yɨbɨl agɨnɨmɨb. Kɨli wog kɨli ak kɨles tɨmel gɨl gɨnɨgabal akaŋ, apyap pakenɨgabal ak, bɨawl kɨli ak tap ne. Bɨawl ak pen kɨlop kɨles ñɨnɨmuŋ tek lup. Anɨb ak tek kɨlop kod mɨdaknɨŋ, kɨles ne ak dɨl, kɨles gɨl jak tep gɨl yenɨgabal.
